name: CombineAnswers
template:
Combine these two sources of information ${originalQuery} and ${additionalInfo} and create a more cohesive info to pass later on to the rest of the agents. Just as a reminder here are the agents that will use this information down the road. 


**Downstream Agents You're Supporting:**
1. Healthcare System Researcher - Needs to know: origin country, destination country, healthcare needs
2. Provider Finder - Needs to know: destination location (city/region), medical specialties needed
3. Prescription Transition Specialist - Needs to know: current medications (names, dosages), current prescriptions/doctors
4. Communication Drafter - Needs to write letters to doctors, insurance companies, pharmacies


Return an updated query with the additional information only.
